text: Jobi's Room () is a Brazilian Flash-animated television series created by Andrés Lieban and Claudia K. Breitman and produced by 2DLab. It originally aired on TV Rá-Tim-Bum from 6 March 2009 at 2010. == Premise == The series is about the stories of the boy named Jobi who lives in his room with his frog named Oscar. == Cast == * Matheus Périssé as Jobi and Taste buds * Guilherme Briggs as Oscar, King and Taste buds * Miriam Ficher as Jobi's Mother * Gustavo Pereira as Indian * Mary Fê as Taste buds * Márcio Simões as Captain == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2009 television series debuts Category:2010 television series endings Category:2000s animated television series Category:Children's television series Category:Brazilian animated television series
title: Jobi's Room
